Dear Sagar,

 

Please review and amend the attached claim form whereas the upper table for shortages and its total in USD & SAR. Below table for damages only in total SAR. Kindly provide us a copy of the damage/shortage report issued by the receiving department.

 

1.	Copy of short landing certificate issued by Saudi customs;
2.	SAL invoice / summery report issued along with customs declaration / Bayan;
3.	Formal valued monetary Claim submitted to the responsible parties holding them liable (include proof of sending / acknowledgement and reply);
4.	Correspondence with the shipper for the shortage and for holding the carriers liable; 

 

Best

Dear Sagar,

 

Please review and amend the attached claim form whereas the upper table for shortages and its total in USD & SAR. Below table for damages only in total SAR. Kindly provide us a copy of the damage/shortage report issued by the receiving department.

 

1.	Copy of short landing certificate issued by Saudi customs;
2.	SAL invoice / summery report issued along with customs declaration / Bayan;
3.	Formal valued monetary Claim submitted to the responsible parties holding them liable (include proof of sending / acknowledgement and reply);
4.	Correspondence with the shipper for the shortage and for holding the carriers liable; 

 

Best
